Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the individuals in the image are members of the RSS without any concrete proof or verification.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image is actually from Bangladesh and not India, as evidenced by the watermark and other sources.

Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation exists that the individuals in the image could be members of the Bangladesh Chatra League, as suggested by the similarity in headscarf colors and the presence of similar caps worn by Awami League members.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by relying on social media posts and narratives without conducting thorough verification or fact-checking.
Understate: There is no evident understatement bias in this claim.
